se.lypson.common.collections
Interface ISet

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountingSet, OrderedCountingSet, Set, SynchronizedSet
public interface ISet

An interface for storing elements without duplicates or a specified order (as in the mathematical set concept). This is functionally a subset of the Set interface available in Java SE, intented for use in Java ME.

Author:
Tobias Persson

Method Summary

          Adds an element to the set.

enumeration

java.util.Enumeration enumeration()
Returns an enumeration of the elements in the set. The order of the elements enumerated are not specified and may differ between different calls to the method.

Returns:
An enumeration of the elements in the set.
